name: UX Competitive Analysis | Notion Template
description: What is this?This is a competitive analysis which requires you to sign up for products and services of your direct and indirect competitors to evaluate their User experience and features. You can use this information to look for opportunities when building your products and services. I used to use it in my agency days to find opportunities for clients to launch new features and products.How does it work? After checkout, in the top right corner click 'Duplicate' to put this in your own Notion wor
